meanings: a pacific[a charming, an attractive] personality

vlive.korean: 매력적인 질문 뭐 없나? Is there no charming question? 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : 🍚 Happy WOOZI Day 🎼

vlive.korean: [뉴욕에서처럼 매력적인 목소리를 들려줄 수 있을까?] [Will he be able to boast his attractive singing voice?] View video World Klass (월드 클래스) : [2회] '안절부절' 떨림과 설렘 속 진행되는 예비 TOO의 첫 녹음

vlive.korean: 안녕하세요 로켓펀치 17살 미소가 매력적인 소희입니다~ Hello, this is SOHEE, Rocket Punch's 17-year old with a charming smile! 듣기 View video Rocket Punch : [COVER U_BEHIND] 01. Call Me Maybe 편

vlive.korean: [나오는 너무나도 매력적인 미성 이 집 리드보컬 진~짜 잘하잖아요!] [he has this amazing voice, ASTRO's lead vocalist is so talented!] View video V PICK! : [V PICK! 1분 입덕가이드] 아스트로 윤산하 편 (1min-Helpful Guide to ASTRO YOON SANHA)
vlive.english: [he has this amazing voice, ASTRO's lead vocalist is so talented!]
